publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5466 Adam Ingram: The Draft Adoption and Children (Scotland) Act 2007 (Modification of Enactments) Order 2010—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Adoption and Children (Scotland) Act 2007 (Modification of Enactments) Order 2010 be approved. Supported by: Michael Russell*

S3M-5466 Adam Ingram: The Draft Adoption and Children (Scotland) Act 2007 (Modification of Enactments) Order 2010—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Adoption and Children (Scotland) Act 2007 (Modification of Enactments) Order 2010 be approved. Supported by: Michael Russell
S3M-5466 The Draft Adoption and Children (Scotland) Act 2007 (Modification of Enactments) Order 2010 (lodged on 7 January 2010) Jackie Baillie*, Patricia Ferguson*
